subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The 40-year-old American Chris Horner kept his overall lead in the next-to-last stage of the Tirreno-Adriatico cycling race in Italy.
snippet: The 40-year-old American Chris Horner kept his overall lead in the next-to-last stage of the Tirreno-Adriatico cycling race in Italy.
